pokemonDataSources.marketplace: Live marketplace listings with prices and card details
pokemonDataSources.userCollections: User profile data with total volume and card counts
pokemonDataSources.cardDetails: Individual card data with images, grades, and valuations
pokemonDataSources.storeListings: eBay integration with Pokemon card store data
pokemonDataSources.vmBoxes: Virtual machine box contents with Pokemon card prizes
pokemonDataSources.filters: Available Pokemon sets, graders, grades, and metadata

keyFindings: Active Pokemon card marketplace with live listings
eBay integration for additional Pokemon card data
User collection metrics and transaction volumes
Historical sales data and pricing trends
Advanced filtering by sets, graders, grades, and rarity
Virtual machine boxes containing Pokemon card prizes
nextSteps: Implement API client for data extraction
Integrate pricing data into PokeDAO system
Cross-reference with existing eBay and Pokemon TCG data
integrationPotential: HIGH - Excellent source for Pokemon card pricing and market data
